claim_text: The health initiative PM-KISAN has set up the required number of primary health centres in Uttar Pradesh and increased service coverage.
report_text: Local NGOs report that large numbers of eligible farmers in Uttar Pradesh have not received the promised transfers or faced delays in payments. Many households reported receiving taps but no running water.

claim_text: MGNREGA claims that farmer beneficiaries in Madhya Pradesh have received timely financial assistance under the scheme.
report_text: Health facility mapping found that new primary health centres are functional and several programs are reaching intended beneficiaries. Third-party monitors reported improved service indicators this year.

claim_text: Atmanirbhar Bharat reports that roads connecting habitations in municipality, Bihar are complete and motorable throughout the year.
report_text: Independent monitoring found electricity connections installed and many households reporting regular supply in several villages. Third-party monitors reported improved service indicators this year.

claim_text: The government has ensured that all households in urban slum of Bihar have access to piped water connections under Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana.
report_text: Local surveys confirm that a large majority of eligible families in Bihar received the promised benefits and subsidies under Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana. Local administrators confirmed household-level connections during surprise checks.

claim_text: The government has ensured that all households in municipality of Assam have access to piped water connections under PM Awas Yojana.
report_text: The road is reported incomplete or damaged in many stretches, leaving several habitations with only seasonal access. Road construction stalled due to contractor disputes and monsoon damage.

claim_text: The health initiative MGNREGA has set up the required number of primary health centres in West Bengal and increased service coverage.
report_text: Official numbers and local reports diverge; further verification on selected samples is required to confirm the extent of coverage.

scheme_name: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana)
claim_text: All rural households in municipality, Tamil Nadu are reported to have received clean cooking fuel connections under Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana).
report_text: On-ground checks show that toilets were constructed in the majority of households in targeted areas and ODF status has improved. Beneficiary interviews corroborated receipt of benefits and regular services.

claim_text: Digital India has eliminated open defecation in most areas of Uttar Pradesh and constructed toilets in all target households.
report_text: A field investigation in municipality, Uttar Pradesh found many households still without functioning piped water connections; supply remains intermittent. Toilets are unusable due to lack of water connections or broken pits.

claim_text: Smart city projects under Atmanirbhar Bharat have made the municipal services fully digital and integrated in Bihar.
report_text: The claim is partially supported by some administrative records, but local interviews and sample checks show variations that raise uncertainty.

scheme_name: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana)
claim_text: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana) claims that farmer beneficiaries in Kerala have received timely financial assistance under the scheme.
report_text: Field verification in urban slum, Kerala indicates that most households do have piped water and receive regular supply, corroborating the official claim. Local administrators confirmed household-level connections during surprise checks.

claim_text: Digital India has achieved 100% coverage of targeted children for nutrition interventions in selected districts of Maharashtra.
report_text: Survey data is inconclusive; official dashboards show coverage but independent sample surveys indicate uneven implementation across the district.

claim_text: The government has ensured that all households in village panchayat of Kerala have access to piped water connections under Swachh Bharat Mission.
report_text: Health facility mapping found that new primary health centres are functional and several programs are reaching intended beneficiaries. Beneficiary interviews corroborated receipt of benefits and regular services.

claim_text: The government has ensured that all households in municipality of Tamil Nadu have access to piped water connections under Smart Cities Mission.
report_text: Media fact-checks reveal that toilets built under the program are not functional or lack water and maintenance, undermining ODF claims. Payments were delayed by months according to farmer groups.

claim_text: The government has ensured that all households in taluka of Chhattisgarh have access to piped water connections under Ujjwala Yojana.
report_text: On-ground reporting shows that electricity is available but often limited to a few hours a day; connection figures appear inflated. Toilets are unusable due to lack of water connections or broken pits.

scheme_name: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana)
claim_text: Saubhagya (Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana) claims that farmer beneficiaries in Haryana have received timely financial assistance under the scheme.
report_text: On-ground reporting shows that electricity is available but often limited to a few hours a day; connection figures appear inflated. Electric meters installed but supply often limited to a few hours.
